name: jds-cache-api
description: JDS methods for VX-Sync and RDK
author: David Wicksell <david.wicksell@accenturefederal.com>

scripts.test: set -x; npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.check-publish-dates-of-installed-package: which jq >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'Install jq to run this command.'; exit; }; npm ls --depth=0 --json | jq -r '.dependencies | to_entries | map("\(.key) \(.value.version)") | .[]' | while read line; do name="${line/ */}"; version="${line/* /}"; npm view --json $name@$version time | (jq -r --arg version $version '.[$version]'; echo $name) | paste - -; done | sort
